summary: Comprehensive testing of Blood Bank Management System's Donor Registration + Staff Approval feature completed. Backend APIs show 100% success rate with all 16 donor-related endpoints working perfectly. Frontend pages load correctly and core functionality is operational. One UI issue identified with dropdown selectors in registration modal.

ui_bugs.component: Donor Registration Modal - Identity Type Dropdown
ui_bugs.issue: Select dropdown options are not clickable in modal context, preventing completion of registration form
ui_bugs.impact: Blocks public donor self-registration via UI
ui_bugs.workaround: Registration works via API calls (tested successfully)

passed_tests: Staff dashboard loads and displays correctly
Donor requests page loads with proper stats and empty state
Donor status check page loads and functions correctly
Status check returns correct 'Registration Approved' result

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (core pages load, navigation works, one dropdown issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix dropdown selector issue in donor registration modal. The shadcn/ui Select component options are not clickable within the modal context, likely due to z-index or portal rendering issues. This prevents users from completing the registration form via the UI.
